title: Help with Script Typeface
content:
I need help identifying the fountain pen like script that is used on these sub pages, I have looked for hours and can't figure it out. I know it is not: Shelley, Palace, Bickham, Kuentsler, Voluta, Arcana, Carpenter, Liana, or Johan. Please help and here is the link, and by the way it's the type that says: About Scenic Loop Cafe, under the about us section.

[http://www.scenicloopcafe.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804095856/http:/www.scenicloopcafe.com/ "http://www.scenicloopcafe.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804095856im_/http:/typophile.com/files/loop1_4840.jpg)
author: Gator4101

comments.content: Thanks so much, that is exactly right.
